name: Honda Vario 125 CC
description: Honda Vario 125 2022 is an automatic scooter with a 4-speed 124.8cc SOHC engine with cooling and has a torque of 5000 rpm.

name: Honda Scoopy 110 CC
description: The Honda Scoopy 110 CC is a retro-styled automatic scooter with a 110 cc SOHC engine. It features automatic transmission and offers comfort for daily commuting.

name: Yamaha Gear 125 CC
description: The Yamaha Gear 125 CC is a modern automatic scooter with a 125 cc engine and CVT transmission. It features a stylish design and advanced features for a comfortable ride.

name: Honda Vario 150 CC
description: The Honda Vario 150 CC offers a 150 cc SOHC engine with eSP technology. This scooter is equipped with premium features and a modern design.

name: New Nmax 155 CC
description: The New Nmax 155 CC is a premium automatic scooter with a 155 cc engine equipped with VVA and ABS technology. It delivers high performance and modern features for a comfortable ride.

name: Old Nmax 155 CC
description: The Old Nmax 155 CC is the previous model of the Nmax scooter, featuring a 155 cc engine with VVA technology. Although it's an older model, it still offers reliable performance and an attractive design.
